EmailTemplate.name: ORMS Standard Pricing
EmailTemplate.subject: ORMS Pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Current Pricing is Attached Stay up to date and download it today! https://www.onereversemortgageservices.com/s/pricing
Current Turn Times
New Registration - 30 minutes Submit for Conditional Approval - 24 hours Conditions Review - 24 hours Clear to Close - 24 hours Docs to Closing Agent - 24 hours from Final HUD Approval
Resources Available Marketing Hub http://wwww.bookoforms.com/
Reverse Mortgage 101 https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3099649019651749122
Portal Tour https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/45693900407792641
To no longer receive emails from One Reverse Mortgage Services please reply back to this email with UNSUBSCRIBE in the body of the email.
